parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the brakes to lock up or fail, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The front brake lever is frozen in the open position
the front brake lever is completely stiff
the rear brake pedal bottoms out
resulting in sudden loss of rear braking
and the vehicle is unable to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Contaminated brake fluid can cause the ABS system to fail, leading to brake failure and potential accidents.
symptoms: The brake fluid is contaminated with moisture
which can damage the actuator valves in the ABS system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The freezing of the brake lever can cause the brakes to fail, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The front brake lever is frozen in the open position
the front brake lever is completely stiff
and the brake lever is unable to be pulled.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the sidewall on the Dunlop D408F tire can lead to a blowout, loss of control, and potentially cause accidents, resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Cracking or splitting of the tire sidewall
often noticed while driving at moderate speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of a separate rear brake light and the design of the combined turn signal, running light, and brake light can lead to confusion for other drivers, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions and accidents.
symptoms: Difficulty for other drivers to determine when the motorcycle is braking
as the turn signals only change in intensity and do not turn off and on
making it hard to distinguish between braking and turning.
